gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: AnaEE-France services for experimentation on continental ecosytems

gmd:textGroup.gmd:LocalisedCharacterString: Services AnaEE-France pour l'expérimentation sur les ecosystèmes continentaux

gmd:deliveryPoint.gco:CharacterString: Domaine Saint Paul - Site Agroparc CS 40509

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString:
AnaEE France has brought together in an integrated network a unique collection of experimental platforms in controlled, semi-natural or natural environments, analysis platforms and shared instruments as well as modeling platforms and Database Information Systems, all devoted to the biology of continental ecosystems. The infrastructure is built around three main service offerings that provide access to a range of experimental facilities: the Très Grande Infrastructure de Recherche des Écotrons - Écotrons Very Large Research Infrastructure, four experimental platforms in semi-natural environments, and some 20 natural sites in metropolitan France and French Guiana where long-term experiments are conducted in forests, pastures, lakes and crops. In the field of environmental microbiology, AnaEE France is also investing in the shared instruments and analytical resources required for a detailed characterization of the environment and microorganisms.
In a single integrated network it provides all the tools required to study, understand and model biological systems and conduct innovative biological research on gene - environment interactions, biodiversity and the functioning of ecosystems.

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: GEMET - INSPIRE themes, version 1.0 INSPIRE themes

gmd:supplementalInformation.gco:CharacterString: You can customize the template to suit your needs. You can add and remove fields and fill out default information (e.g. contact details). Fields you can not change in the default view may be accessible in the more comprehensive (and more complex) advanced view. You can even use the XML editor to create custom structures, but they have to be validated by the system, so know what you do :-)
